data.title: Ordered magnetic bimetallic chains: a novel class of one-dimensional compounds

questions.question: What are the x, y, and z coordinates of the Mn atom in the NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 compound?
In the CuMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 compound, what is the Biso value for the Cu atom?
Compare the Biso values of Mn in NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 and CuMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 compounds. Which one is higher?
questions.answer: The Biso value of Mn in CuMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 (3.96) is higher than in NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 (0.02).

questions.question: What is the publication year of the article discussing ordered magnetic bimetallic chains?
How many water molecules are present in the formula of both NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 and CuMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 compounds?
What is the difference in the z-coordinate between the S(1) and S(4) atoms in the NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 compound?
Based on the Biso values, which compound appears to have more thermal motion for the Mn atom, NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 or CuMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5?
questions.answer: CuMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 appears to have more thermal motion for the Mn atom.

questions.question: Considering the Biso values, which element in the NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 compound has the least thermal motion?
questions.answer: Mn has the least thermal motion with a Biso value of 0.02.

questions.question: If the Biso value indicates the degree of thermal motion, which compound's Cu atom is more statically positioned, NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 or CuMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5?
questions.answer: The question is invalid as NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 does not contain a Cu atom.

questions.question: Which compound has a higher average Biso value for oxygen atoms, NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 or CuMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5?
questions.answer: CuMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 has a higher average Biso value for oxygen atoms.

questions.question: Is the thermal motion of sulfur atoms greater in NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 compared to CuMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 based on Biso values?
questions.answer: No, the thermal motion of sulfur atoms is not necessarily greater in NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 compared to CuMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5.

questions.question: Given the Biso values, which compound's atoms exhibit more overall thermal motion, NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 or CuMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5?
questions.answer: CuMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5's atoms exhibit more overall thermal motion.

questions.question: The NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 compound has a Mn atom with x, y, and z coordinates of 0.78659, 0.35121, and 0.4533, respectively.
The Biso value of the Mn atom in the NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 compound is higher than in the CuMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 compound.
The article discussing ordered magnetic bimetallic chains was published in 2002.
Both NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 and CuMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 compounds contain 7.5 water molecules.
The z-coordinate difference between the S(1) and S(4) atoms in the NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 compound is 0.0957.
The Biso value of the Cu atom in the NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 compound is 1.39.
Oxygen atoms in the CuMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 compound have a higher average Biso value than those in the NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 compound.
The thermal motion of sulfur atoms is greater in NiMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5 compared to CuMn(S2C2O2)2(H2O)7,5.
